abstract: Tablet computers are becoming the “first screen” for pre-school-age viewers and Disney is making a broader investment with the app debut of “Sheriff Callie’s Wild West.”
snippet: Tablet computers are becoming the “first screen” for pre-school-age viewers and Disney is making a broader investment with the app debut of “Sheriff Callie’s Wild West.”
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — A cat in a pink cowboy hat is leading Disney’s television operation deeper into the Wild West of mobile viewing, where it hopes to connect with the company’s core audience.

headline.main: Disney Show Will Appear First on App for Tablets
headline.print_headline: Disney Show Will Appear First on App For Tablets
